name: Merry Underwater Rings
description:
Merry Underwater Rings
You need to throw all the rings on the crystals.
The game is made under cross-platform. I did not have time to pack under other platforms. But interactions are all custom for PC and Android.
Windows x64.
Content Used:
-Crystal materials are taken from "SillyGeo" UE4.
